person.persName: Price Longest (Hancock County, KY, farmer & home guard soldier)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Hannah Longest. Father of Hugh Longest, James H. Longest, Preston Longest, and J. D. Longest. Farm laborer in Shelby County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hancock County in 1860. Served in the Hancock County Home Guard in June 1861.
